name: Town of Beginnings
description: The main settlement on the 1st Floor. The beginning point for all players and the largest town in Aincrad.

name: Tolbana Town
description: The second largest town on the 1st Floor, lined with large windmills and close to the 1st Floor Labyrinth.

name: Horunka Village
description: A small village northwest of the Town of Beginnings, where players can begin specific life-skill quests.

name: Medai Village
description: A rustic village on the 1st Floor with friendly locals and basic services.

name: Floor 1 (Overworld)
description: Overworld view of the first floor linking towns and the labyrinth.
